clinical_study.brief_title: Non-interventional Study on Compliance of Inhaled Treatment With Ventavis in Patient With Pulmonary Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Multicentre Non-interventional Study on Compliance of Inhaled Treatment With Ventavis in Patient With Pulmonary Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: Local, prospective, multicenter, non-comparative, non-interventional, observational study. It is planed to assess compliance of patients with PH (pulmonary hypertension) with the physician's recommendation in real practice.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Number of fully inhaled doses per day versus the recommended number as a measure of compliance
Number of fully inhaled doses in total versus the recommended number as a measure of compliance

secondary_outcome.measure: Score on dyspnea Borg CR (category ratio) 10 scale
Patients' quality of life, assessed by validated questionnaire
Number of participants with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability

arm_group.description: The patients with pulmonary hypertension with inhaled treatment with Ventavis according to routine practice meeting the criteria of inclusion.

study_pop.textblock: Male and female patients ≥ 18 years old with PH, treated with Ventavis and for which the inclusion and exclusion criteria are fulfilled, are eligible for enrolment into the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female patients ≥ 18 years old
- Diagnosis of PH
- Planned or current treatment with Ventavis (not more than 6 month)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindications for the use of Ventavis in accordance with the local product information
